sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from 'react'
import { Dimensions, ScrollView, StyleSheet, View } from 'react-native'
import { ContextProvider } from './context'
import { RoomModal } from './room-modal'
import { List } from './list'
import { Background } from '../core/background'
import { Header } from './header'
import { DirectMessage } from './direct-message'
import { DirectMessageModal } from './direct-message-modal'
import { Behaviour } from './behaviour'
import { Profile } from './profile'
import { useInitiateRoomsHandlers } from '../ws/hooks/use-initiate-rooms-handlers'
import { Snackbar } from '../core/snackbar'

export const Rooms = () => {
  useInitiateRoomsHandlers()
  const roomsRef = useRef(null)
  console.log('D: ', Dimensions.get('screen').height)

  return <ContextProvider>
    <View style={styles.fullWidth}>
      <ScrollView  style={styles.background}>
        <Background/>
        <Header/>
        <List/>
        <DirectMessage/>
        <RoomModal/>
        <DirectMessageModal/>
        <Profile/>
        <Snackbar ref={roomsRef} />
        <Behaviour/>
      </ScrollView>
    </View>
  </ ContextProvider>
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create<any>({
  fullWidth: {
    width: Dimensions.get('window').width,
    height: Dimensions.get('window').height
  },
  background: {
    width: '100%',
    height: '100%',
    minHeight: Dimensions.get('window').height,
  },
})
